name: Malazan
desc: Malazan Book of the Fallen is a high fantasy book series by the Canadian author Steven Erikson.

name: Death
desc: Death is the permanent cessation of all biological functions that sustain a living organism.

name: God
desc: A supernatural being considered divine or sacred.

name: Totem Pole
desc: Monumental carvings, a type of Northwest Coast art, consisting of poles, posts or pillars, carved with symbols or figures.

name: First Nations
desc: The First Nations are the predominant indigenous peoples in Canada south of the Arctic Circle.

name: Pacific Northwest
desc: A geographic region in western North America bounded by the Pacific Ocean to the west and (loosely) by the Rocky Mountains on the east.
Myths and legends, usually involving gods and supernatural beings, with narratives that play a fundamental role in a society.

name: Joy
desc: A feeling of great pleasure and happiness.
